entry.title: Erdogan blames Armenia for recent Azerbaijani incursion into Karabakh

media:group.media:title: Erdogan blames Armenia for recent Azerbaijani incursion into Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev and Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan are set to meet with European Union Council President Charles Michel on April 6 amid renewed escalations in Nagorno-Karabakh. Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoฤan told reporters today that Azerbaijan is committed to all agreements made with Armenia, and no violation has been made by Azerbaijan since the end of the war in 2020.
A peace treaty between Armenia and Azerbaijan should be signed as soon as possible, says Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev.

media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีกีฎ ีญีกีฒีกีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ึีกีฏีกึีฃีจ ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ ีดีฅีฎ ีพีฟีกีถีฃ ีง ีบีกึีธึีถีกีฏีธึีด. ีกีตีฝ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ิฑิบ ีบีกีฟีฃีกีดีกีพีธึ, ยซีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถยป ีญีดีขีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีถีคีกีด ิทีฌีซีถีกึ ีีกึีคีกีถีตีกีถีจ: ีึีก ีฏีกึีฎีซึีธีพ, ีฅีฉีฅ ีีกึีกีขีกีฒีตีกีถ ีฅึีฏึีธึีค ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีถีธึ ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีธึีถีฅีถีกีฌีธึ ีบีกึีกีฃีกีตีธึีด ีฏีฏีกึีธีฒีกีถีกึ ีญีธึีฝีกึีฅีฌ ีถีธึ ีฆีซีปีธึีดีถีฅึีซึ, ีกีบีก ีกีตีชีด, ีฅึีข ีกีตีค ีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏีจ ีดีฝีญีพีฅีฌ ีง, ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีบีกีฟีธึีฐีกีถีจ ีฃึีฅีฉีฅ ึีกีฏีพีฅีฌ ีง:

media:group.media:description:
ีีกึีฟีซ 30-ีซีถ ีฑีฅึีขีกีฏีกีฌีพีฅึ ีกึีฟีกีฏีกึีฃ ีซึีกีพีซีณีกีฏีถีฅึีซ ีถีกีญีกึีกึ ิฑีถีคึีกีถีซีฏ ีีซีฌีธีตีกีถีจ, ีธึีซีถ ีฏีกีทีกีผึ ีฝีฟีกีถีกีฌีธึ ีดีฅีฒีกีคึีกีถึ ีกีผีกีปีกีคึีพีฅึ ีฐีกีปีธึีค ึ ึีจึ ีีซีฌีธีตีกีถีจ ิฑีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีฐีฅึีธีฝีซ ีฏีธีนีธึีดีถ ีฝีฟีกึีฅีฌ ีง ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟ ีีซีฏีธีฌ ีีกีทีซีถีตีกีถีซึึ ีีก ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ ีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏ ีดีกีฝีถีกีฏึีฅีฌ ีง ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีฐีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ีธึีฒีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีผีกีฆีดีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซีถึ

entry.title: Russian peacekeepers in Karabakh not being sent to Ukraine, says Russian Ambassador to Azerbaijan

media:group.media:title: Russian peacekeepers in Karabakh not being sent to Ukraine, says Russian Ambassador to Azerbaijan
media:group.media:description:
The situation on the line-of-contact in Nagorno-Karabakh remains relatively calm but tense, according to the Nagorno-Karabakh Information Center.
The Russian Ambassador to Azerbaijan, Mikhail Bocharnkiov, has denied reports that Russian peacekeepers in Karabakh are being moved to Ukraine.
Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan has discussed the situation in Nagorno-Karabakh with Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili.
Source: Ruptly
